page.title: 08Field House Farm Langtoft
page.content: At our farm every day a big tanker comes and collects our milk.Our tank holds 350 gallons of milk.We have 115 cows.There are 85 cows,1 bull,13 calves and 16 heifers.They give alot of milk.The cows get their milk from the grass.They eat 13 yards of grass in a day.They are also fed with dairy nuts in the summer.In winter they eat silage,hay and treated straw.They are kept indoors in winter. We have 92 acres of grass and 72 acres of spring barley.We will not be combining until August.
